description.value: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.races.Item.2fOpI6sjb01eYtEi]{Phentomites} have the ability to see heat signatures. You can bring down a reactive, transparent film installed as a second set of eyelids so that you can see the same signatures as a full action. You can then detect the latent heat trails left by passing creatures, allowing you to use the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.gZlg2ZKze0erNLmP]{Perception} skill to perform the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.UDTsEIldhXTn0VJA#follow-tracks]{follow tracks} task of the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.UDTsEIldhXTn0VJA]{Survival} skill; this also functions as the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.universal-creature-rules.Item.nTS5FBfDAorzVb7n]{Tracking} universal creature rule. While this ability is active, you take a –1 penalty to Reflex saving throws. You can deactivate this ability as a move action.

modifiers.name: Heat Tracker Graft
